Text: Thanks 4 starting 2 have releases without rarfiles. Excellent work! Keep it up, and yet again, Thanks 4 sharing!

Thanks!  AVI is best.
What's with all the other little files?

@SnoGryphn

.avi --> Movie
.nfo --> Info file (Open as textfile)
.svf --> File to check CRC checksum
.txt --> Textfile
